item.title: Cristian Paul Bara Mindcraft Theory of Mind Modelling 2021 Paper Review
item.description:
[TOC]

  1. Title: MINDCRAFT: Theory of Mind Modeling for Situated Dialogue in Collaborative Tasks
  2. Author: Cristian-Paul Bara et. al.
  3. Publish Year: 2021 EMNLP
  4. Review Date: 12 Nov 2021

Summary of paper

This needs to be only 1-3 sentences, but it demonstrates that you understand the paper and, moreover, can summarize it more concisely than the author in his abstract.

The contribution of this paper is the mind modelling dataset (Using Minecraft environment).
